quick_answer.text: 1 cup of dry-roasted sunflower seed kernels provides ~817 kcal and ~29 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Salted version (added sodium, no kcal change)
Add 1 tsp olive oil per cup

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup of sunflower seeds kernels?
faqs.a: Approximately 817 kcal for 1 cup (140 g) dry-roasted, unsalted kernels.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in 1 cup sunflower seeds?
Are sunflower seeds kernels high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~72 g total fat per cup, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.

faqs.q: How much fiber in 1 cup of sunflower seeds kernels?
faqs.a: Around 12 g dietary fiber, supporting digestion.
No cholesterol (0 mg) as they are plant-based.
